rewards.description: 🎮 Announcing Kakele Online's Epic Twitch Drops!  Embark on a unique journey in Kakele's realm. Dive into mystical lands, conquer quests, and enjoy our exciting Twitch Drops for enhanced gaming. Unlock rewards, including teleports, herbs, potions, and materials.  🕒 Timed Rewards: Enjoy cities Teleports, Ultra potions, Gold Refiner Kits and collect Dog Cards and Trophies.  💰 Prosperity Path: Gain Copper, Tin, Silver, Iron, Gold, Life Herbs, Mana Herbs for success. Accumulate Reputation Coins.  🎈 Grand Finale: End with an exclusive Twitch Drop and Bacon Extravaganza surprise! Link accounts, watch streams, and claim rewards for an unforgettable RPG experience.  🌟 How to Join:  Link Accounts: Connect your account and Twitch in the game app. Watch Streams: Tune in during to your favorite Kakele streamer. Claim Rewards: Receive Twitch Drop notifications claim in the game app.  Influencers: To enable drops on your stream, email us!  Don't miss the chance to enrich your journey with Twitch Drops!
rewards.name: August

rewards.description: Whispers of comfort and dreams have drifted into Blackwater Town… and with them, a bundle unlike any other: the Pyjama Set!  Wrapped in softness and stitched with style, the Pyjama Body is the first of several cozy treasures. As you watch and play, you’ll also have the chance to unlock gold, glyphs and more!  Don’t sleep on it! Tune in, gear up, and claim your rewards before they vanish with the morning mist!
rewards.name: Blackwater Pyjama Party

rewards.description:
Hey Anglers,

August marks Fishing Planet’s Anniversary, and this year we are celebrating 10 years since release on Steam!

To make it truly special, we’ve prepared 10 exclusive Twitch Drop boxes packed with cool rewards, including Pond Passes for both saltwater and freshwater maps, 108,000 Credits, 27 Baitcoins, and a selection of super useful fishing items to enjoy the best anniversary celebration on the Planet! The drops will be live for almost a month, and each viewer can get all rewards by watching a total of 12 hours. 

Tight lines and let’s rock the waters together!
rewards.name: 10-for-10 Drops Campaign

rewards.description: Celebrate the Early Access launch of Stormgate with three Twitch-themed in-game cosmetics! From July 30 until August 27, Twitch Drops will be enabled for all Stormgate-streaming channels. Tune into any streamer with Drops enabled to start earning progress towards our in-game rewards.
rewards.name: Stormgate Campaign 1 Drop
